title: California Zephyr Timetable
heading: Amtrak's California Zephyr
top_text: Richmond, CA station elevator is temporarily out of service for emergency repairs as of Jan 14, 2023. See AmtrakSanJoaquins.com for updates.
bottom_text:
San Francisco can be reached by BART from Richmond
or by Amtrak-ticketed connecting bus from Emeryville.
